page.title: 18PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: These are our favourite games in order of popularity. 1) To play{stag}you wait till someone shouts and then everybody has to run into the semicircle.The last one in the semicircle is on and calls somebodys name. The person called has to try to get past the person who is on. If he does it, all the other children try to get past. 2) One of the group has to throw the ball behind them. If you catch it you have to say cabbage and if you do not catch it you have to say{Queenio, {queenio who's got the ballio,}and the person has to guess who has the ball. 3) To play{tig on the lines}the last one on the yellow netball court lines is on.Everyone has to run along the lines. The one who is on has to try and tig someone. When he has tigged everyone you start all over again.
